message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire the product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer not only secures an excellent deal but also ensures you receive a high-quality item that meets your needs and expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.
